summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 are not satisfied based on the diff summary. Documentation was added under frontend/README.md rather than at the repository root, and the required static image assets are not shown as added under frontend/public/assets/generated. The diff also includes multiple product/feature changes (backend prediction logic, new/expanded frontend components, SEO files) that go beyond the requestâ€™s non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a root-level developer documentation file (e.g., README.md) that explains where frontend/backend code lives, points to backend/main.mo and frontend/src/App.tsx entry points, and includes local dev + IC deploy steps referencing frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a README added at frontend/README.md, not at the repository root. No root-level README.md is shown as added/modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the static images /assets/generated/ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg and /assets/generated/car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: No binary/static asset files are shown as added in the diff summary under frontend/public/assets/generated, so existence cannot be confirmed.
evidence: File diff summary: Added files list contains no frontend/public/assets/generated/* images
